cast.name: 阿里坎·巴拉斯 Alican Barlas

introduction: A family of three, a Turkish man, a Korean woman, and her mother with Alzheimer's disease struggle to stay together when the couple's third IVF attempt fails and the tension peaks at home. Meanwhile, the husband develops a new romantic interest, a young French entrepreneur. He uses every fight at home as an excuse to leave for his new lover, and his final excuse further complicates the situation. The couple's conscience and the very core of who they are will be tested.
